sections.comments: REGISTRATION REQUIRES DEPARTMENTAL APPROVAL. INTERESTED STUDENTS SHOULD CONTACT THE DEPARTMENTAL ADVISOR AND COURSE INSTRUCTOR IN ORDER TO REGISTER.Students are required to attend the same schedued meetings as PHYS 449.

description: A research project, undertaken under the direction of a faculty member, culminating in a written report. This course requires  approval of the course instructor  and  program  advisor in the Department of Physics and Astronomy.
